title: Stereo.Type: A Typographic Ballet
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011090536im_/http:/typophile.com/files/eb1_4749.jpg)

There has been pictures of the work of Ebon Heath in the actual "ZEIT-Magazin", and a small interview with the artist. But the size of this sculptures isn't mentioned anywhere. Did anyone see the exhibition in New York last summer and can tell more about the size? [http://www.maround.com/mablog/tyler\_askew/2008/06/typographic-ballet.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011090536/http:/www.maround.com/mablog/tyler_askew/2008/06/typographic-ballet.html "http://www.maround.com/mablog/tyler\_askew/2008/06/typographic-ballet.html")
author: nora g

comments.content: it tells you on the site
Thank you Brett; Now I found the information on the gallery site; sometimes scrolling can be useful;-) BTW: You did wonderful pix.
